mapper.select: /* EmpStoreMapper.getEmpStoreEmpList */ SELECT the.EMP_NO, the.EMP_NM, the.SERVICE_FG, COUNT(thes.STORE_CD) AS STORE_CNT FROM TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE the, TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE_STORE thes WHERE 1=1 AND thes.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= the.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thes.EMP_NO (+)= the.EMP_NO AND the.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND the.USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY the.EMP_NO, the.EMP_NM, the.SERVICE_FG ORDER BY the.EMP_NO

/* EmpStoreMapper.getEmpManageStoreList */ SELECT thes.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tms.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, thes.EMP_NO, tms.SYS_STAT_FG FROM TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE_STORE thes, TB_MS_STORE tms WHERE 1=1 AND tms.STORE_CD (+)= thes.STORE_CD AND thes.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND thes.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY thes.STORE_CD

/* EmpStoreMapper.getEmpNoManageStoreList */ SELECT tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD, tms.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, the.EMP_NO, tms.SYS_STAT_FG FROM TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE the WHERE 1=1 AND the.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND the.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE_STORE thes WHERE 1=1 AND thes.STORE_CD = tms.STORE_CD AND thes.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND thes.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ) ORDER BY tms.STORE_CD
mapper.insert: /* EmpStoreMapper.getEmpManageStoreSave */ INSERT INTO TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE_STORE ( HQ_OFFICE_CD, EMP_NO, HQ_BRAND_CD, STORE_CD, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID ) VALUES ( #{hqOfficeCd}, #{empNo}, '0000000', #{storeCd}, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId} )
mapper.select: /* EmpStoreMapper.getEmpStoreStoreList */ SELECT tms.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tms.SYS_STAT_FG, COUNT(thes.EMP_NO) AS EMP_CNT FROM TB_MS_STORE tms, TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE_STORE thes WHERE 1=1 AND thes.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thes.STORE_CD (+)= tms.STORE_CD AND tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} GROUP BY tms.STORE_CD, tms.STORE_NM, tms.SYS_STAT_FG ORDER BY tms.STORE_CD

/* EmpStoreMapper.getStoreManageEmpList */ SELECT thes.HQ_OFFICE_CD, thes.STORE_CD, thes.EMP_NO, the.EMP_NM, the.SERVICE_FG FROM TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE_STORE thes, TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE the WHERE 1=1 AND the.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= thes.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND the.EMP_NO (+)= thes.EMP_NO AND thes.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND thes.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} ORDER BY thes.EMP_NO
